"Hurry!": "Move it!"
"Come this way, and stay close!"
"Wha-Wha-Wha! I-It sure is busy around here. But it doesn't seem all that chaotic."
"Okay people! Everyone who's ready is going to be heading west, it's gonna be a big move! Take only the absolute essentials!"
"This city may come under attack once more. In order to keep everyone safe, we ask that you all take refuge for a time."
"Keep the line nice and orderly, and no cutting! If you have any questions, please direct them to my royal guard, and they'll be happy to help!"
"That voice... Marge?! Alisa's there too! They're at the castle, let's hurry!"
"Marge!"
"Such well-worn insolence...! You finally made it, fairy!"
"The Guardian, as well. We have been waiting for you."
"Why are you two here?"
"What are you doing here?"
"Exactly what it looks like. We're helping the citizens of Cuent evacuate."
"They might not have followed orders if it were me alone, so I enlisted the Sword Maiden's help."
"Helping them evacuate... So you know what's going on outside?"
"I haven't the foggiest. But it's obvious that it's bad. We can see that black cocoon all the way from here."
"A black liquid is spilling out from the center of it. Demons and Devil Castles are appearing from it nonstop, and the area around it is in complete disarray."
"They keep coming back no matter how many we kill, so we've set up a blockade and are using it to buy time to evacuate. The refugees are heading west."
"Epic welcomes immigrants with open arms! Even though it's a crappy place to live!"
"I will lend my blade, even though this does not concern the wicked dragon. The situation is one serious enough to warrant that."
"...The sword speaks. It is saying that this is the embodiment of calamity. That a wicked force greater than the Crimson Dragon is stirring."
"Our overeager Harriet picked now of all times to go missing, too. Which is why I've gotta do everything I can."
"If she were here, her first priority would be the safety of the citizens. So I'm prioritizing it in her stead."
"Alrighty, that should be enough to answer your question. Now I've got a question of my own."
"...Where is Harriet?"
"She's..."
"...She has been captured. Held within the black cocoon."
"Don't look at us all surprised like that. Anyone with a brain could figure it out."
"Harriet hasn't returned despite what's going on. It's obvious that something has happened to her."
"If she were hurt, you wouldn't have left her side. If she had perished, you would have simply told us. Which can only mean she has been abducted."
"What's more, you came to us first to learn about the situation. Your priority wasn't to locate her."
"Which means you already know where she was taken. And there's only one place that could be."
"...You're amazing, Marge."
"I'm not queen of the country that invented a drug to control minds for nothing."
"...I can tell you two are troubled as well."
"So as queen, I will spur you on with all my strength!"
"It is obvious what must be done!"
"Before it showed up, we were golden! Now that it's here, we're a murky brown! Therefore, we just have to get rid of it!"
"But Harriet is inside of the black cocoon..."
"Well-... Hmm, alright then. We'll leave that to you!"
"You flake!"
"Quiet, fairy! It's our only option! Whenever we're unable to proceed, the Guardian paves a path for us!"
"...I agree with the queen of Epic. The Guardian continues to make possible the impossible."
"They were able to purify the Crimson Dragon and rescue my uncle trapped within."
"You even saved me from being swallowed by the darkness."
"Your accomplishments don't stop there either."
"Ask anyone what they believe in, and they'll shoot right back with \"the Guardian\"!"
"Because they have faith in you, they support you! No matter what happens, the result will be one they believed in!"
"So you need not feel accountable, and you need not let your resolve waver."
"The responsibility for your actions lies upon my shoulders, and upon Harriet's."
"Marge..."
"Im-pu-dence! You must use my full name!"
"Guardian. For you, it is possible."
"The sword spoke as such. It says you need only bring about one of the miracles you have created time and time again."
"It is not just the sword... Even I... Alisa Landale believes so."
"Mine is a blade that fights the evils of this world. I hereby pledge an oath to support you in your quest."
"Let's rescue Harriet"
"Let's save the world"
"The Saviors"
"Thus, the Heroes Gathered Here"
"Citizen"
"Citizen"
